title: Episode #81 - Mike Catherwood & ME
description: SoCal Radio fixture & Co-Host of Loveline, Mike Catherwood and I hang in the Mancave and talk about Kevin and Bean, fights, the Gracies, drugs, divorce, and what it takes to be a man.
content:encoded: SoCal Radio fixture & Co-Host of Loveline, Mike Catherwood and I hang in the Mancave and talk about Kevin and Bean, fights, the Gracies, drugs, divorce, and what it takes to be a man.
